name: ClickVilisation
description:
ClickVilisation is a mix between a clicker and a city-builder.

You need to collect ressources, upgrade your miners and lumberjacks to collect stone and wood for you and build a beautiful village. 

It's the first version of the game. I will try to add features :

  1.  Effects on builds
  2. Adding more ressources
  3.  Maybe enemies that must be repelled. 

I hope you will enjoy the first version and send me some feedbacks to upgrade the game(and if you find some bugs). Thank you !
